subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong, saying he is not ready to contend for the title, will ride in support of his Astana teammate Levi Leipheimer in the Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Lance Armstrong, saying he is not ready to contend for the title, will ride in support of his Astana teammate Levi Leipheimer in the Giro d’Italia.
